data.text: Muwulire kino mmwe ente ez’omu Basani ezibeera ku Lusozi Samaliya,
Mu butukuvu bwe Mukama Katonda alayidde nti,
Kale mmwe mugende e Beseri mukoleyo ebitasaana;
“Nabaleetera enjala embuto zammwe ne ziba njereere mu buli kibuga,
Abantu ne bavanga mu kibuga ekimu ne balaga mu kirala nga banoonya amazzi banyweko,
“Emirundi mingi ebirime byammwe n’ennimiro zammwe ez’emizabbibu na bigengewaza.
